Beginner's Luck

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Sorcerer, Wild Magic class feature
Benefit: Before making an untrained skill check, choose even numbers or odd numbers. If the result of the d20 roll for that skill check matches the kind of number selected, you gain a feat bonus to that skill check equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 47.
